name: reldmghm

stmt.origin: reldmmpt2(hs0, hs1, cghm, cgrp, cgrp, cab(hs3, wsbc(hs2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wa(wf(cv(hs3), cv(hs2), cfv(cbs, cv(hs1))), wral(hs4, cv(hs2), wral(hs5, cv(hs2), wceq(cfv(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs4), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(hs5))), co(cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs1)), cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs5))))))))))

body.origin:
|- wrel(cdm(cghm))
-| wceq(cghm, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cgrp, cgrp, cab(hs3, wsbc(hs2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wa(wf(cv(hs3), cv(hs2), cfv(cbs, cv(hs1))), wral(hs4, cv(hs2), wral(hs5, cv(hs2), wceq(cfv(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs4), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(hs5))), co(cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs1)), cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs5)))))))))))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffsc(hs1, cgrp)
body.pretty:
⊢ Rel(dom(GrpHom))
⊣ GrpHom =(hs0 ∈ Grp, hs1 ∈ Grp ↦ { hs3 |[(Base ` hs0)/ hs2]((hs3 : hs2 →(Base ` hs1))∧ ∀(hs4 ∈ hs2, ∀(hs5 ∈ hs2,(hs3 `(hs4[(+ ` hs0)]hs5))=((hs3 ` hs4)[(+ ` hs1)](hs3 ` hs5)))))})
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)
⊣ d(hs1, Grp)
